cards.title: Bibs the Bard
powers: Disard a card. One player may play a card or draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw 3 cards. If they do, they must discard 1 card.
One hero may deal 1 target 4 melee damage.
Choose a target. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 2 until the end of the villain's turn.

openingLines.default: Holy moly who the heck is this person!?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: With the power of the fourth wall behind me, we'll take down this Darkseid wannabe!

cards.title: The Poking Stick Plus One!
cards.body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Bibs} by 1.
cards.flavorText: Stabby stab! Stabby stab! Poking people--with a tab!

cards.title: The Plot Staff
cards.body: The first time Bibs deals damage each turn, activate the {Flair} text of a card in play.
powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Cantrip or Spellslot card, put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: This magical piece of 2x4 can cast sleep without magic!!

cards.title: Tap Yeezys
cards.body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, activate a {Flair} text.
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Replace them in any order.

flavorQuotes.text: Look, swear on your {BR} Yeezys, if we gon' fight, we gon' fight.

cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey to the BreadBank #03

cards.title: Bag of Holding
body: Search your deck or trash for an equipment card and put it into play.
If you searched your deck this way, shuffle it.
cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey of Modern Comedy #20

cards.title: Fire Bolt
powers: Bibs deals 1 target 3 fire damage. Then, destroy this card

cards.title: Green-Flame Blade
cards.flair: Increase the next time Bibs deals fire damage by 2. If Bibs deals fire damage, destroy this card.
body: Whenever Bibs deals melee damage to a target, Bibs also deals that target 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm the dancer of the Borris Canyon!

cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Dark Souls of Journeys.

cards.title: Light
flair: Draw 3 cards, then destroy this card.
body: At the end of your turn, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck.

cards.title: Vicious Mockery
cards.flair: Increase damage dealt by Hero targets by 1. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
powers: Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Your mother was a Bidoof and your father smelled of Pinap berries!

cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey for the Python Grail. #22

cards.title: Battle Rose

flavorQuotes.text: Dancing around the battlefield poking, burning, and shouting about. Thats the way of a Battle Rose

body: At the start of your turn, increase the next time Bibs deals damage by 1.
The first time Bibs deals damage to a target each turn, increase the next time it takes damage by 1.

cards.title: Spell Slinger
cards.flavorText: The art of a throwing books and scrolls at enemies is what it truly means to be a Spell Slinger.
body: The first time you activate a (Flair) text each turn, you may draw a card.
Whenever a Cantrip card would be destroyed, shuffle it into your deck instead..

cards.title: Sword Dancer
body: Whenever you would activate (Flair) texts, Bibs may deal 1 target 2 melee damage instead.
You may use {The Poking Stick Plus One!}'s power twice per power phase.
cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey to Oh god she's running with scissors

cards.title: Healing Word
powers: One target regains up to 3 HP. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Silence
cards.flair: Discard 3 cards. Villain cards cannot be played until the end of the villain turn.
powers: Destroy up to 2 ongoing cards. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey to Mindless Self Indulgence.

cards.title: Storm Sphere
cards.flair: Bibs deals 1 target 3 lightning damage. Destroy, this card.
powers: If you do, {Bibs} deals each target 1 lightning damage.
cards.flavorText: I have nothing witty to say.

cards.title: Sword Burst
cards.flair: Bibs deals each villain target 1 melee damage.
powers: Bibs deals up to 3 targets 2 melee damage. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Bibs, The Journey of a Children's Card Game.

powers: Active a (Flair) text of a card. Then, destroy that card.

One Player may draw a card.
Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt by heroes by 1.
